subject: docs: update CLAUDE.md, README, USER_GUIDE for current state
body:
- CLAUDE.md: remove stale "Remaining Work" list
- README.md: update reports table to reflect 4-tab structure and view levels
- USER_GUIDE.md: fix Developer Patterns row (no longer hidden), add role-specific guidance note, document new summary cards on Activity and Work tabs
title: update CLAUDE.md, README, USER_GUIDE for current state
